column4: using ndiswrapper on a pavilion tx1000. visat has wifi, but Ubunto claims the hardware is not present ???
yes.. hp pavilion tx1000. bcmwl5 driver. but ndiswrapper says: hardware not present
I too had one, the hardware was damaged due to over heat
but i have dualboot, and vista has wifi. so... can it be damaged then ?
i know.. the tx1000 is running way too hot. the GPU is in the red
yes.. i have a wired connection
haha.. yes.. i know.. horrible laptop. but only one I've got :(
are both the modules installed , ndiswrapper bcm43xx
ahh.. i will check for bcm 43xx. in the package manager ?
what about b43 and b43-fwcutter ? should i uninstall those ?
